data.name: Seven: Enhanced Edition - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Digital Soundtrack - captivating music by The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt composer, Marcin Przybyłowicz featuring Arkadiusz Reikowski, Jacek Paciorkowski & Miracle of Sound.

Total audio duration: 1:50:14
